Line 47: Line 47:
Super OS has received some positive reviews, with [[softpedia]] saying ''"it is a distribution with super powers [â¦] [due to] the inclusion of applications, tools and technologies that are missing from a standard Ubuntu"'' (regarding version OS 9.04).<ref>[http://news.softpedia.com/news/It-039-s-a-Bird-It-039-s-a-Plane-It-039-s-Super-Ubuntu-101085.shtml news.softpedia.com/news/It-039-s-a-Bird-It-039-s-a-Plane-It-039-s-Super-Ubuntu-101085.shtml]</ref>And ''"Super OS 9.10 - Karmic Koala with Muscles"'' about version 9.10<ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/Super-OS-9-10-Karmic-Koala-with-Muscles-130795.shtml</ref>. Super OS (still with the name ''Super Ubuntu'' at the time), was also [[Lifehacker]]'s ''featured download'' saying "''It's basically just a re-compiled version of the official Ubuntu distribution, but with a whole bunch of features included that save you the time of grabbing them yourself''".<ref>[http://lifehacker.com/5123360/super-ubuntu-rolls-multimedia-and-helpful-extras-into-ubuntu lifehacker.com/5123360/super-ubuntu-rolls-multimedia-and-helpful-extras-into-ubuntu]</ref>.
Super OS has received some positive reviews, with [[softpedia]] saying ''"it is a distribution with super powers [â¦] [due to] the inclusion of applications, tools and technologies that are missing from a standard Ubuntu"'' (regarding version OS 9.04).<ref>[http://news.softpedia.com/news/It-039-s-a-Bird-It-039-s-a-Plane-It-039-s-Super-Ubuntu-101085.shtml news.softpedia.com/news/It-039-s-a-Bird-It-039-s-a-Plane-It-039-s-Super-Ubuntu-101085.shtml]</ref>And ''"Super OS 9.10 - Karmic Koala with Muscles"'' about version 9.10<ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/Super-OS-9-10-Karmic-Koala-with-Muscles-130795.shtml</ref>. Super OS (still with the name ''Super Ubuntu'' at the time), was also [[Lifehacker]]'s ''featured download'' saying "''It's basically just a re-compiled version of the official Ubuntu distribution, but with a whole bunch of features included that save you the time of grabbing them yourself''".<ref>[http://lifehacker.com/5123360/super-ubuntu-rolls-multimedia-and-helpful-extras-into-ubuntu lifehacker.com/5123360/super-ubuntu-rolls-multimedia-and-helpful-extras-into-ubuntu]</ref>.
â
{{As of|2009|10}}, Super OS ranked 120 of the page hit ranking of [[DistroWatch]], compared with [[Ubuntu]] (which it's based on), which was ranked first<ref>[http://distrowatch.com/stats.php?section=popularity DistroWatch - Linux Distributions - Facts and Figures]</ref>.
+
{{As of|2009|12}}, Super OS ranked 99 of the page hit ranking of [[DistroWatch]], compared with [[Ubuntu]] (which it's based on), which was ranked first<ref>[http://distrowatch.com/stats.php?section=popularity DistroWatch - Linux Distributions - Facts and Figures]</ref>.
